GSP29nysu51au:0: NySBh_5,1.0 sādharmya-vaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpāj jātibahutvam iti saṃkṣepeṇo7ktaṃ, tad vistareṇa vibhajyate --- tāḥ khalv imā jātayaḥ sthāpanā-hetau prayukte caturviṃśatiḥ pratiṣedhahetavaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:1: NySBh_5,1.1 jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇo7ktāyā vistaro vaktavya itī7dānīm ārabhyate
GSP29nysu51au:13: dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktaḥ kriyāvāṃs tathā cā8tmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51au:15: pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād vibhu
GSP29nysu51au:16: cā8kāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā cā8tmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51au:18: viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvat-sādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇe7ti
GSP29nysu51au:20: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathā0tmā tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51au:22: cā7sti viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvat-sādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ
GSP29nysu51au:24: vaidharmyeṇa co7pasaṃhāraḥ niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt kriyāvad dravyam avibhu
GSP29nysu51au:25: dṛṣṭaṃ niṣkriyaṃ loṣṭaḥ na ca tathā0tmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51au:26: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-rahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na ca tathā0tmā tasmān na niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51au:28: kriyāvad-vaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvate9ti viśeṣa-hetv-abhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:29: atha sādharmyasamaḥ kriyāvāṃl loṣṭaḥ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yukto dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cā8tmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti na cā7sti viśeṣa-hetuḥ kriyāvad-vaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ
GSP29nysu51au:33: pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā sā tu dharma-viśeṣe no7papadyate
GSP29nysu51au:34: go-sādharmyād gotvāj jāti-viśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati na tu sāsnā4di-sambandhāt
GSP29nysu51au:35: / aśvā3di-vaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇā3di-bhedāt /
GSP29nysu51au:37: cai7tat kṛta-vyākhyānam avayava-prakaraṇe pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc cai7kā1rtha-kāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākye iti /
GSP29nysu51au:42: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yogāl loṣṭavat kriyāvān ātmā loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51au:43: atha na sparśavāṃl loṣṭavat kriyāvān api na prāpnoti viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51au:45: loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ kāmam ātmā9pi
GSP29nysu51au:46: kriyāvān avibhur astu viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51au:47: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ tāv etau sādhya-dṛṣṭānta-dharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:50: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktaṃ kiṃcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ evaṃ kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktaṃ kiṃcit kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcid
GSP29nysu51au:51: akriyaṃ yathā0tmā viśeṣo vā vācya iti /
GSP29nysu51au:53: dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ sādhyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:55: tathā0tmā prāptas tarhi yathā0tmā tathā loṣṭa iti /
GSP29nysu51au:56: sādhyaś cā7yam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ atha nai7vaṃ na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ
GSP29nysu51au:61: upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti tatra na labhyo go-gavayayor
GSP29nysu51au:69: evaṃ sādhyā1tideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti //
GSP29nysu51au:70: NyS_5,1.7 prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā9viśiṣṭatvād
GSP29nysu51au:72: NySBh_5,1.7 hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā ? na tāvat prāpya
GSP29nysu51au:74: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ? aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati
GSP29nysu51au:76: prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51au:79: NySBh_5,1.8 ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛ-karaṇā1dhikaraṇāni
GSP29nysu51au:80: prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭā3di-kāryaṃ niṣpādayanti abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam
GSP29nysu51au:82: NyS_5,1.9 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇā1napadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena
GSP29nysu51au:84: NySBh_5,1.9 sādhanasyā7pi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:85: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yogī kriyāvāṃl loṣṭa iti hetur nā7padiśyate na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astī7ti
GSP29nysu51au:87: kriyāvān ātmā kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate ---
GSP29nysu51au:88: kriyā-hetu-guṇa-yuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kaḥ punar ākāśasya
GSP29nysu51au:93: NySBh_5,1.10 idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam
GSP29nysu51au:94: upādadate kim-arthaṃ ve9ti ? didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśya-darśanā1rtham iti /
GSP29nysu51au:95: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpā1ntaraṃ kasmān no7pādadate ? antareṇā7pi
GSP29nysu51au:98: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kim-artham ucyata iti aprajñātasya jñāpanā1rtham iti /
GSP29nysu51au:101: sa khalu "laukika-parīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhi-sāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta" iti
GSP29nysu51au:105: NySBh_5,1.11 pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate anena
GSP29nysu51au:106: prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti /
GSP29nysu51au:109: sa ca kathaṃ hetur na syāt ? yady apratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syād iti //
GSP29nysu51au:111: NySBh_5,1.12 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte
GSP29nysu51au:112: apara āha --- prāg utpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnā3nantarīyakatvam
GSP29nysu51au:113: anityatva-kāraṇaṃ nā7sti, tad-abhāvān nityatvaṃ prāptaṃ, nityasya
GSP29nysu51au:115: NyS_5,1.13 tathā-bhāvād utpannasya kāraṇo1papatter na kāraṇa-pratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysu51au:117: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati /
GSP29nysu51au:118: prāg utapatteḥ śabda eva nā7sti, utpannasya śabda-bhāvāc
GSP29nysu51au:120: kāraṇo7papatter ayukto 'yaṃ doṣaḥ "prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇā1bhāvād" iti //
GSP29nysu51au:123: NySBh_5,1.14 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte
GSP29nysu51au:124: hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate --- sati prayatnā3nantarīyakatve asty
GSP29nysu51au:125: evā7sya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam, asti ca ghaṭenā7nityena, ato nityā1nitya-sādharmyād anivṛttiḥ saṃśaya iti //
GSP29nysu51au:126: NyS_5,1.15 sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyanta-saṃśaya-prasaṅgo nityatvā1nabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyā7pratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29nysu51au:127: NySBh_5,1.15 viśeṣād vaidharmyād avadhāryamāṇe 'rthe puruṣa iti, na
GSP29nysu51au:129: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyā7nityatve
GSP29nysu51au:133: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśaya-hetur iti nā7bhyupagamyate /
GSP29nysu51au:134: na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇu-puruṣa-sādharmyaṃ saṃśaya-hetur bhavati
GSP29nysu51au:136: NySBh_5,1.16 ubhayena nityena cā7nityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣa-pratipakṣayoḥ
GSP29nysu51au:138: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati, dvitīyaś ca nitya-sādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti evaṃ ca sati prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād iti hetur anitya-sādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate , prakaraṇā1nativṛtter nirṇayā1nativartanam /
GSP29nysu51au:144: NySBh_5,1.17 ubhaya-sādharmyāt prakriyā-siddhaṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyā-siddhir uktā bhavati /
GSP29nysu51au:145: yady ubhaya-sādharmyaṃ, tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati
GSP29nysu51au:147: pratiṣedho no7papadyate, atha pratiṣedho1papattiḥ pratipakṣo no7papadyate,
GSP29nysu51au:152: NySBh_5,1.18 hetuḥ sādhanam, tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet /
GSP29nysu51au:153: yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam, asati sādhye kasya sādhanam ? atha paścād, asati sādhane kasye7daṃ sādhyam ? atha yugapat sādhya-sādane, dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na
GSP29nysu51au:159: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate, so
GSP29nysu51au:161: yat tu khalū7ktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti ? yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasye7ti
GSP29nysu51au:163: NySBh_5,1.20 pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti no7papadyate,
GSP29nysu51au:166: NySBh_5,1.21 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite
GSP29nysu51au:169: prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād anitya-sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti, arthād āpadyate nitya-sādharmyān nitya iti, asti cā7sya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51au:170: NyS_5,1.22 anuktasyā7rthā3patteḥ pakṣa-hāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cā7rthā3patteḥ
GSP29nysu51au:171: NySBh_5,1.22 anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ
GSP29nysu51au:172: pakṣa-hāner upapattir anuktatvāt, anitya-pakṣa-siddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nitya-pakṣasya hānir iti /
GSP29nysu51au:175: yadi nitya-sādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ, arthād āpanna, anitya-sādharmyāt
GSP29nysu51au:178: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate --- dravāṇām apāṃ patanā1bhāva iti
GSP29nysu51au:182: upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve, sarvā1viśeṣaḥ prasajyate /
GSP29nysu51au:189: nai7vaṃ sarva-bhāvānāṃ sad-bhāvo7papatti-nimittaṃ dharmā1ntaram asti, yena aviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP29nysu51au:191: sad-bhāvo1papatti-nimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti, evaṃ khalu vai
GSP29nysu51au:192: kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sad-bhāvo1papatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51au:193: tatra pratijñā2rtha-vyatiriktam anyad udāharaṇaṃ nā7sti, anudāharaṇaś ca hetur nā7stī7ti
GSP29nysu51au:194: pratijñai2ka-deśasya co7dāharaṇatvam anupapannam, na hi sādhyam udāharaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nysu51au:196: tasmāt sad-bhāvo1papatteḥ sarvā1viśeṣa-prasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti /
GSP29nysu51au:201: NySBh_5,1.25 yady anityatva-kāraṇam upapadyate śabdasye7ty anityaḥ śabdo nityatva-kāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syā7sparśatvam iti nityatvam apy
GSP29nysu51au:206: NySBh_5,1.26 ubhaya-kāraṇo1papatter iti bruvatā nā7nityatva-kāraṇo7papatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, yadi pratiṣidhyate no7bhaya-kāraṇo1papattiḥ syāt /
GSP29nysu51au:208: vyāghātāt pratiṣedha iti cet, samāno vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:210: nityatvā1nityatva-prasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvato9ktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet ?
GSP29nysu51au:211: sva-pakṣa-para-pakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ, sa ca nai7katarasya sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysu51au:219: NySBh_5,1.28 prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir
GSP29nysu51au:221: yadi ca kāraṇā1ntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate, kim atra pratiṣidhyata
GSP29nysu51au:223: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyā7nupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51au:226: gṛhyeta cai7tad asyā7grahaṇa-kāraṇam udakā3divat, na gṛhyate /
GSP29nysu51au:236: yat-pratijñātaṃ "na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyā7nupalabdhir ity"
GSP29nysu51au:243: NySBh_5,1.30 āvaraṇā3dy-anupalabdhir nā7sti, anupalambhād ity ahetuḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:246: yad asti tad upalabdher viṣayaḥ, upalabdhyā tad astī7ti
GSP29nysu51au:248: yan nā7sti tad anupalabdher viṣayaḥ, anupalabhyamānaṃ
GSP29nysu51au:251: upalabdhy-abhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP29nysu51au:253: āvaraṇā3dīni tu vidyamānatvād upalabdher viṣayāḥ, teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nysu51au:255: svaviṣaya-pratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate --- na santy āvaraṇā3dīni anupalambhāt tv anupalabhiḥ sidhyati, viṣayaḥ sa tasye7ti //
GSP29nysu51au:260: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nā7sti me saṃśayajñānam iti /
GSP29nysu51au:265: tad-anupalabdher anupalambhād abhāva-siddhir iti, etan no7papadyate //
GSP29nysu51au:269: anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenā7nityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyā7nityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate /
GSP29nysu51au:270: so 'yam anityatvena pratyavasthānād anityasama iti // NySBh_
GSP29nysu51au:276: sādharmyād asiddheḥ pratiṣedhasyā7py asiddhiḥ, pratiṣedhyena sādharmyād iti //
GSP29nysu51au:277: NyS_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte ca sādhya-sādhana-bhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya co7bhayathā-bhāvān NySBh_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhya-sādhana-bhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysu51au:279: sa co7bhayathā bhavati, kenacit samānaḥ kutaścid
GSP29nysu51au:283: sādharmya-viśeṣo hetuḥ, nā7viśeṣeṇa sādharmya-mātraṃ vaidharmya-mātraṃ vā
GSP29nysu51au:285: tulya-dharmo1papatteḥ sarvā1nityatva-prasaṅgād anityasama" iti, etad ayuktam iti /
GSP29nysu51au:286: aviśeṣasama-pratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam //
GSP29nysu51au:287: NyS_5,1.35 nityam anitya-bhāvād anitye nityatvo1papatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51au:289: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athā7nityam ? yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati ? dharmasya sadā
GSP29nysu51au:290: dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nysu51au:295: NySBh_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne
GSP29nysu51au:296: 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyā7nityatvam, anityatvo1papatteś ca "nā7nityaḥ śabda" iti pratiṣedho no7papadyate
GSP29nysu51au:297: atha nā7bhyupagamyate, nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatī7ti hetv-abhāvāt pratiṣedhā1nupapattir iti /
GSP29nysu51au:299: yo 'yaṃ paripaśnaḥ --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha ne7ti, ayam anupapannaḥ
GSP29nysu51au:300: kasmāt ? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam ; evaṃ ca saty
GSP29nysu51au:303: / nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete, na sambhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:304: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva,
GSP29nysu51au:309: prayatnā1nantaram ātma-lābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati, yathā
GSP29nysu51au:310: ghaṭā3di-kāryam ; anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatī7ty etad vijñāyate /
GSP29nysu51au:311: evam avasthite prayatna-kāryā1nekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51au:312: prayatnā1nantaram ātma-lābhaś ca dṛṣṭo ghaṭā3dīnām, vyavadhānā1pohāc
GSP29nysu51au:321: 'rthasyo7palabdhilakṣaṇā9bhivyaktir bhavatī7ti, na tu śabdasyā7nupalabdhi-kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid upapadyate, yasya prayatnā1nantaram
GSP29nysu51au:322: apohāc chabdasyo7palabhi-lakṣaṇā9bhivyaktir bhavatī7ti, tasmād utpadyate śabdo nā7bhivyajyate iti //
GSP29nysu51au:323: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti /
GSP29nysu51au:326: NySBh_5,1.39 pratiṣedho 'py anaikāntikaḥ, kiṃcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin ne7ti
GSP29nysu51au:332: so 'yam ubhaya-pakṣa-samo viśeṣa-hetv-abhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti //
GSP29nysu51au:334: yatrā7viśeṣo dṛśyate tatro7bhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti //
GSP29nysu51au:336: NySBh_5,1.41 yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:338: prayatnā3nantarīyakatvād iti sādhana-vādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:343: samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51au:346: NyS_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha-vipratiṣedhe samāno
GSP29nysu51au:348: NySBh_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya tad-uddhāram
GSP29nysu51au:349: akṛtvā9nujñāya pratiṣedha-vipratiṣedhe tṛtīya-pakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇa-vādino matā1nujñā
GSP29nysu51au:353: NySBh_5,1.43 sthāpanā-pakṣe prayatna-kāryā1nekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanā-hetu-vādinaḥ sva-pakṣa-lakṣaṇo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51au:356: so 'yaṃ sva-pakṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ doṣam apekṣamāṇo 'nuddhṛtyā7nujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ para-pakṣe upasaṃharati /
GSP29nysu51au:360: hetu-nirdeśe ca saty anena para-pakṣa-doṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nysu51au:362: uktaḥ, tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha /
GSP29nysu51au:363: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ
GSP29nysu51au:365: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha-vipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matā1nujñā prasajyata iti, tathā9syā7pi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya
GSP29nysu51au:366: pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matā1nujñā prasajyata iti /
GSP29nysu51au:376: samāno doṣa" iti samāna-doṣatvam evo7cyate, nā7rtha-viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti /
GSP29nysu51au:384: prathama-dvitīyayor viśeṣa-hetv-abhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysu51au:385: kadā ṣaṭpakṣī ? yadā "pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa" ity evaṃ pravarttate /
GSP29nysu51au:388: anupalabdhi-kāraṇo1papatter" ity anena tṛṭīya-pakṣo yajyate, tadā
GSP29nysu51au:390: nā7bhivyaktir" iti siddhaḥ prathama-pakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti //
